title: HiRobot
description:
HiRobot App is the mobile application of Haier's overseas robot products. You can complete the functional control of the robot through the App, and easily unlock smart and clean life.

【Equipment Information】
Working status, mode selection, fault information and so on at a glance.
[Appointment for cleaning]
According to your living habits and work hours, personalized robot working hours.
【 Clean area 】
The selected room in the map is divided into regions to quickly realize the cleaning of the designated area.
【Restricted Area Setting】
By manually setting the restricted area and virtual wall, avoid the robot entering the area you do not want to clean.
【Firmware upgrade】
The robot can be updated, unlocked and optimized through remote OTA.
Note: The actual function of the specific model shall prevail.

Official website: https://www.haier.com

Working status, mode selection, fault information and so on at a glance.
[Appointment for cleaning]

By manually setting the restricted area and virtual wall, avoid the robot entering the area you do not want to clean.
【Firmware upgrade】
The robot can be updated, unlocked and optimized through remote OTA.
